backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with user profiles, transactions, game logic, admin credit updates, coupon/referral systems, and various state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report linking a UI backdrop-blur feature to affected files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of many frontend source files including pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration with public, protected admin routes, layout wrapper, and page component mapping.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentSet: Empty placeholder file for admin payment setup component.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component that checks admin permission and redirects unauthorized users to the unauthorized page.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time profile setup including name, DOB, referral handling, and welcome bonus logic.
frontend/src/components/common/PremiumSp: Stylized loading spinner component with configurable size and layered visual effects.
frontend/src/components/game/SpinWheel.t: Canvas-based spin wheel that draws styled segments and handles spinning state and celebrations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout providing navigation, header, animated background, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceTi: Animated numeric ticker that smoothly transitions displayed credit balance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations like profiles, spinning, admin checks, and payments.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining premium theme colors, animations, and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint initializing React root, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides admin navigation cards for managing users, wheel config, withdrawals, and manual payment requests.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManualPaym: Allows admins to view, approve, decline, and configure manual payment requests with tabbed status filtering.
Displays leaderboard-style user list and enables admins to edit user credit balances.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWheelConfi: Lets admins view and update the house edge and shows fixed wheel probability segments.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Placeholder page informing admins that withdrawal processing is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: UI for buying credits via preset, custom, or package amounts, using manual payment requests and QR dialog flow.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Spin-and-win game page handling wheel spins, showing balance, and displaying win/loss outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that authenticates users through Internet Identity with a themed UI.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Shows the status of a submitted manual payment request, refreshing data and displaying pending, approved, or declined states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile details including identity, balance, DOB, bonuses, and transaction count.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Shows full transaction history with deposit, withdrawal, and game spin entries.
frontend/src/pages/UnauthorizedPage.tsx: Access-denied page for unauthorized users with a button to return to the main route.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays the user’s wallet balance, recent transactions, and navigation to buy credits or withdraw.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Shows withdrawal information and alerts users that withdrawals must be requested via support.
frontend/src/utils/creditPricing.ts: Provides helpers to derive a credits-per-INR ratio from packages and compute or validate credit amounts.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions for formatting INR and converting between rupees and paise.
frontend/src/utils/razorpay.ts: Empty placeholder file for Razorpay-related utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, clearing, and managing URL and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, issues, and a request to add blurred or dimmed backgrounds behind popups.
